messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

messages.title: DEMAND BETTER FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
Jo Swinson has plans for the Liberal Democrats to win the next General Election and deliver a better future by investing in NHS and schools.
Jo Swinson has set out plans to tackle the climate emergency.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: Paul Duffy seems to highlight a Liberal Democrat government's capability to deliver a brighter future under the leadership of Jo Swinson.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats rally demonstrating the claim of increasing success and popularity.
Jo Swinson, Party Leader, reinforcing the image of determination and readiness to govern.
Visual comparison of the Liberal Democrats against Conservative and Labour leaders to emphasize a clear choice in the election.
Candidate Paul Duffy with campaign supporters, portraying active community involvement and support.
